Entries.default: The remains of a tower lie strewn upon the ground before you. The stone structure seems to have tumbled over during an earthquake. The tower appears abandoned - not even a corpse remains.
[Search the location.]
[Keep searching this location.]
[Leave.]
You take some time to search the tower...
...and find nothing of value.
...and find a small chest full of coins.
...and find a few useful tools amongst the rubble.
...and find a handful of common gems.
...and find a bundle of crafting ingredients.
...and find a cache of powerful scrolls.
...and find a selection of rare potions crammed onto a shelf.
...and find a tattered grimoire.
...and find a strange pendant glowing with a soft, internal light.
You've searched every inch of the tower. There's nothing left for you to take.
[Take the pendant.]
You pick up the pendant and notice it's curiously warm to the touch, as if someone had just been wearing it.
You've searched every inch of the tower. There's nothing left for you to take.

You find a ruined tower rising up from the top of a low hillock. The wood and stone structure is stained by oily smoke residue, and a smattering of masonry is spread out from the tower's base in a wide fan. It seems to have suffered from some kind of explosion.

A narrow wooden tower rises high above you. Above the door at its base hangs a carved and painted mural of Amira and Ngati engaged in fierce battle. The tower lists heavily to the side, just a few feet from tumbling over entirely.
You return to the base of the tower.
You continue exploring the tower ruins...
